subject: Re: Order #SSN1598, how did it go?

conversations.body_text: Hi Tim Todd,     Sorry for the delay, as it is currently taking longer to ship from China to the US, your order is expected to arrive for you around the 4th. https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEXA1934986389YQ
